name: Slimey's Adventures (FabiDev)
description:
Welcome to Grassy Lands , the world of happiness and joy where Slimes across the Universe live along.They laugh, eat,  play  and feel good in their perfect life.But something is not right... something kills the Silence and Peace... monsters... they are everywhere now... You must restore the balance...

If they ask for a favor, why not do it? You could get rewarded, but don't wait for something in return   !

Visit the shop ! Get stronger  and buy more storage for your backpack .Eat some healthy food and live longer  !

NOTE :

GAME IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT, GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY MAY CHANGE.
